description_en:
**Philips Facial Hair Removal for Women Brr454** is the perfect solution for gentle and effective facial hair removal. This device features a hypoallergenic head, a built-in mirror, and full circle LED lighting to ensure all hairs are removed. Enjoy smooth, flawless skin with **Philips Facial Hair Removal for Women Brr454**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Facial Hair Removal for Women Brr454**:
â­ Thoroughly cleanse and dry your face before use.
â­ Select the appropriate attachment for the area you wish to epilate.
â­ Gently stretch the skin taut.
â­ Place the epilator at a 90-degree angle to your skin.
â­ Turn on the device and move it slowly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Rinse the epilator head under warm water after each use.
â­ Apply a soothing cream or lotion to the epilated areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Facial Hair Removal for Women Brr454**:
â­ Hypoallergenic head
â­ Built-in mirror
â­ Full circle LED light
â­ Self-sharpening blades

This epilator features a comfortable design and effectively removes hair from the root, even very short hairs. It includes 5 attachments to meet all your needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Epilator BRE710/01**:
â­ Use the epilator on dry or wet skin.

â­ Use the integrated light to spot fine hairs.
â­ After use, clean the epilator with the included brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Epilator BRE710/01**:
â­ Main epilator unit.
â­ 5 multi-purpose attachments.
â­ Cleaning brush.
â­ Carrying case.

**Philips QP630/51 OneBlade Face & Body Grooming Kit (3 Blades)** is an innovative grooming tool designed for men. It's engineered to trim, edge, and shave any hair length on the face and body. â­ Unique OneBlade technology provides a smooth and efficient shave. â­ Dual-sided blade for precise edges and sharp lines. â­ Click-on skin guard offers extra protection for sensitive areas. â­ Body comb attachment for an even trim. â­ Rechargeable battery lasts up to 60 minutes. â­ Water-resistant for wet and dry use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips QP630/51 OneBlade Face & Body Grooming Kit (3 Blades)**:
â­ Ensure the device is fully charged before use.
â­ Use on dry or wet skin.
â­ Replace blades every 4 weeks for optimal performance.
â­ Clean the device easily under running water.

description_en:
**Philips NT3650/16** Precision Nose, Ear & Eyebrow Trimmer provides ultimate comfort and precision. â­ Effortless trimming of nose, ear, and eyebrow hair without pulling or tugging. â­ Protective guard system prevents blades from directly touching skin. â­ Fully washable for easy cleaning. â­ Powered by AA battery (included). â­ Ergonomic design with anti-slip grip. â­ Two eyebrow combs (3mm & 5mm) for precise length adjustment. â­ Convenient travel pouch for storage. â­ 2-year warranty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips NT3650/16**: â­ Ensure nostrils are clean before use. â­ Gently insert trimmer inside nose, no more than 0.5cm. â­ Move slowly in a circular motion. â­ Ensure ears are wax-free before trimming. â­ Use the appropriate comb for eyebrow trimming. â­ Move against hair growth. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips NT3650/16**: â­ Trimmer. â­ Two eyebrow combs (3mm & 5mm). â­ Travel pouch. â­ AA Battery.

description_en:
**Philips Sonicare Toothbrush HX6859/68 with UV Sterilization**, an advanced electric toothbrush that provides a deep yet gentle clean. â­ Sonic vibrations effectively remove plaque. â­ Built-in pressure sensor to prevent over-brushing. â­ Three customizable cleaning modes: Clean, White, and Gum Care. â­ BrushSync feature alerts you when to replace your brush head. â­ Stylish and practical travel case. â­ Suitable for use with braces and fillings. â­ Noticeably whiten teeth in just one week. â­ Long-lasting battery. â­ Integrated timer for thorough cleaning. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Sonicare Toothbrush HX6859/68 with UV Sterilization**: â­ Wet the brush head and apply toothpaste. â­ Turn on the brush and gently move it across your teeth and gums. â­ Use the cleaning mode that suits your needs. â­ Do not press hard on the brush. â­ Rinse the brush head after each use. â­ Replace the brush head every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Sonicare Toothbrush HX6859/68 with UV Sterilization**: â­ Soft brush head â­ Ergonomic handle â­ Charging base â­ Travel case â­ User manual

**Philips Sonicare Electric Toothbrush HX6803/26** offers a superior clean with gentle effectiveness. â­ Advanced sonic vibrations remove plaque effectively. â­ Built-in pressure sensor prevents over-brushing. â­ One cleaning mode for a thorough clean. â­ BrushSync feature connects the smart brush handle and smart brush heads. â­ Whitens teeth in just one week. â­ Safe for sensitive areas, braces, and fillings. â­ QuadPacer and Smartimer timers ensure a thorough 2-minute clean. â­ Alerts you when it's time to replace your brush head.

It features PrecisionTrim technology and a Protective Guard system to prevent pulling and tugging. â­ Precise and safe trimming. â­ Easy to use and clean. â­ Fully washable. â­ Powered by an AA battery (included). â­ Stylish and comfortable design. â­ Included travel pouch.

**Philips Heated Straightening Brush BHH730/03** is your solution for naturally straight, shiny hair in minutes. â­ Achieve naturally straight hair in just 5 minutes. â­ Get smooth, shiny, frizz-free hair. â­ Extra-large brush area for easier and faster styling. â­ ThermoProtect technology protects your hair from damage. â­ Paddle-shaped design straightens more hair at once. â­ Swivel cord for comfortable use. â­ Triple bristle design gently detangles. â­ ThermoProtect minimizes heat damage. â­ 200Â°C temperature for effective styling. â­ Keratin-infused ceramic coating for smooth gliding. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Heated Straightening Brush BHH730/03**: â­ Ensure your hair is dry before use. â­ Section your hair into small parts. â­ Gently run the brush through each section. â­ Don't press too hard. â­ Let the brush cool before storing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Heated Straightening Brush BHH730/03**: â­ Brush with keratin-infused ceramic bristles. â­ Swivel electric cord. â­ Heat-resistant protective cap.

description_en:
**Philips Hair Straightener BHS378/03 with Heat Protection** - For smooth and shiny hair! The **Philips Hair Straightener BHS378/03 with Heat Protection** features long Keratin-infused plates and 6 LED temperature settings, ensuring easy and fast styling. ThermoProtect technology prevents overheating, while ions add vibrant shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Hair Straightener BHS378/03 with Heat Protection**:
â­ Unplug the appliance before use.
â­ Ensure your hair is completely dry before straightening.
â­ Choose the appropriate temperature for your hair type.
â­ Gently comb your hair before starting.
â­ Take small sections of hair when straightening.
â­ Do not hold the appliance on the same section of hair for too long.
â­ After finishing, switch off and allow to cool.
â­ Clean the appliance with a soft, dry cloth.
â­ Avoid using oily hair products.
â­ Use a heat protectant spray before straightening to protect your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Hair Straightener BHS378/03 with Heat Protection**:
â­ Keratin plates.
â­ Heating elements.
â­ Electronic temperature control components.
â­ Heat-resistant outer casing.
â­ Power cord.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips S5887/10 Shaver**: â­ Ensure the device is fully charged before first use. â­ Use shaving foam or gel for wet shaving. â­ Clean the device after each use. â­ Replace blades regularly for optimal results.

**Philips Hair Dryer & Styler BHA530/03 (2 in 1)**: This versatile hair styling device gives you multiple hairstyles with extra care. It features even heat distribution and 4x more ions for a shiny, healthy glow. It includes 5 styling attachments, including a 38mm ThermoBrush, a paddle straightening brush, a narrow concentrator, a 30mm retractable bristle brush, and a volumizer for root lift. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Hair Dryer & Styler BHA530/03 (2 in 1)**:
â­ Choose the right attachment for your desired hairstyle.
â­ Select the appropriate heat and speed setting for your hair type.
â­ Use the narrow concentrator for precise styling or touch-ups.
â­ Use the cool air setting for gentle drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Hair Dryer & Styler BHA530/03 (2 in 1)**:
â­ Argan-oil infused ceramic plates.
â­ Even Heat Distribution technology.
â­ 4x more ions.
â­ Multiple heat settings.
â­ 5 styling attachments.

description_en:
**Philips Sonicare Brush Heads HX9062/96**, advanced brush heads providing a deep clean and noticeable whitening. â­ Exceptional deep clean. â­ Visibly whiten teeth in just 3 days. â­ Removes up to 10x more plaque than a manual toothbrush. â­ Compatible with most Philips Sonicare toothbrush handles (except PowerUp Battery and Essence). â­ Easy click-on design. â­ Soft, flexible bristles that adjust to the shape of your teeth and gums. â­ BrushSyncâ„¢ technology for optimal cleaning mode selection. â­ Smart bristle indicator to know when to replace the brush head. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Sonicare Brush Heads HX9062/96**: 
â­ Attach the brush head to your toothbrush handle. â­ Press the power button. â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions. â­ Replace the brush head every 3 months or when the blue bristles turn white. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Sonicare Brush Heads HX9062/96**: 
â­ Soft nylon bristles. â­ Durable plastic base. â­ Flexible rubber design. 

#Philips #Sonicare #Toothbrush #TeethWhitening #OralHygiene #OralHealth #BrushHeads #WhiteTeeth #DentalCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Philips Beard Trimmer BT5502/13** offers a precise and professional beard trimming experience. â­ Featuring self-sharpening blades, ensuring precise edges and superior trimming every time. â­ Provides 40 precise length settings, ranging from 0.4 to 10 mm in 0.2 mm increments, giving you complete control over your beard length. â­ Offers 75 minutes of cordless use after an 8-hour charge. â­ Suitable even for the thickest hair types. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Beard Trimmer BT5502/13**: 
â­ Ensure the device is fully charged before use.
â­ Select your desired trimming length using the control dial.
â­ Gently glide the trimmer across your skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Clean the device after each use with the provided brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Beard Trimmer BT5502/13**: 
â­ Beard Trimmer
â­ Cleaning Brush
â­ Power Adapter

**Philips Sonicare Diamond Clean Black Electric Toothbrush**, experience superior cleaning! â­ Removes up to 7x more plaque than a manual toothbrush. â­ Whitens teeth in just 1 week. â­ Improves gum health in only 2 weeks. â­ #1 Electric Toothbrush recommended by Dental Professionals. â­ 5 brushing modes: Clean, White, Sensitive, Gum Care, and Deep Clean. â­ 2-minute timer and QuadPacer for a thorough clean. â­ Includes charging glass and premium travel case.

description_en:
**Philips Bodygroom BG5020/13** is the perfect body groomer for use in or out of the shower. Designed for a smooth, efficient full-body shave, even in hard-to-reach areas. The **BG5020/13** features rounded heads to protect your skin from cuts, plus 3 attachable combs (3mm, 5mm, 7mm) for the perfect hair length. Enjoy up to 60 minutes of cordless shaving after a full 1-hour charge. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Bodygroom BG5020/13**:
â­ Use on wet or dry skin.
â­ Use combs to achieve desired hair length.
â­ Charge for 1 hour before use.
â­ Clean the device after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Bodygroom BG5020/13**:
â­ Body groomer.
â­ 3 combs (3mm, 5mm, 7mm).
â­ Long attachment for hard-to-reach areas.
â­ Charging stand.

description_en:
**Philips Hair Straightener BHS675/03 Mid-Range** for sleek, shiny hair. This straightener is perfect for those seeking effective straightening with hair protection. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Hair Straightener BHS675/03 Mid-Range**:
â­ Use on completely dry hair.
â­ Section your hair into small sections for easier straightening.
â­ Slowly and steadily glide the straightener over each section of your hair.
â­ Avoid passing the straightener over the same section of hair more than once.
â­ After straightening, let your hair cool before brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Hair Straightener BHS675/03 Mid-Range**:
â­ Smooth ceramic plates.
â­ SplitStop technology for split-end prevention.
â­ UniTemp sensor for temperature control.

**Philips Hair Straightener BHS676/03 Mid-Range** - Achieve smooth, shiny hair with the **Philips Hair Straightener BHS676/03 Mid-Range**. This amazing straightener gives you the perfect style while protecting your hair ends from splitting.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Philips Hair Straightener BHS676/03 Mid-Range**:
â­ Use on completely dry hair.
â­ Section your hair into thin strands.
â­ Glide each section smoothly between the plates.
â­ Avoid passing the straightener over the same section multiple times.
â­ Start from the roots and work your way down to the ends.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Philips Hair Straightener BHS676/03 Mid-Range**:
â­ Keratin-infused ceramic plates.
â­ UniTemp sensor for temperature control.
â­ SplitStop technology for split-end prevention.

**Revlon Protect & Style Round Brush** is a masterpiece in Revlonâ€™s hair care range, crafted with advanced Ion technology to protect your hair from damage and minimize static.  Suitable for all hair types, from short to long, adding shine and softness.  It features a comfortable and easy-to-grip handle, making it perfect for both personal and professional use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Revlon Protect & Style Round Brush**:
â­ Ensure your hair is dry before use.

description_en:
**Revlon Protect & Style Square Brush** is the perfect brush for effortless hair styling. Designed with the latest technology, it easily manages both wet and dry hair.  **Revlon Protect & Style Square Brush** minimizes hair damage, allowing you to create stunning hairstyles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Revlon Protect & Style Square Brush**:
â­ Dry your hair with a soft towel.
â­ Gently brush your hair from the bottom up.
â­ Use a hairdryer, sectioning your hair into small parts.
â­ Smoothly brush your hair using the **Revlon Protect & Style Square Brush**.
â­ For waves, curl your hair then brush downwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Revlon Protect & Style Square Brush**:
â­ Soft bristles.
â­ Comfortable rubberized handle.
â­ Ionic conditioning technology to reduce static.
â­ Heat resistant.

description_en:
**Sensilab Sens Omega** is a high-quality fish oil supplement packed with Omega-3 fatty acids. Each two softgels contain 1000mg of concentrated fish oil, providing 280mg of EPA and 190mg of DHA. Support your heart and brain health, lower triglycerides, and ease joint pain. No fishy aftertaste!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensilab Sens Omega**:
â­ Take 2 softgels daily, or as directed by your physician.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensilab Sens Omega**:
â­ Concentrated Fish Oil Omega-3 (1000 mg per 2 softgels)
â­ Eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) (280 mg per 2 softgels)
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) (190 mg per 2 softgels)

Free of artificial colors, flavors, preservatives, dairy, wheat, gluten, soy, egg, tree nuts, or GMOs. Suitable for vegetarians. Do not exceed the recommended dose. Consult your doctor before use if you are taking medications or have allergies.

Its innovative formula combines MorosilÂ®, a blood orange extract effective in reducing belly fat, and MaxiThermÂ®, a chili pepper extract that enhances fat burning. It also contains green tea extract, black pepper for enhanced absorption, and vitamin B6 for increased energy. Enjoy a slim figure and high energy levels naturally and safely.

description_en:
**Sensilab Flexi Force Collagen Chondroitin Plus - 15 Sachets** is a highly absorbable collagen powder with rosehip extract, designed to support joint and cartilage health. â­ Contains BioCell Collagen, a type of chicken-extracted collagen that enhances joint flexibility. â­ Features UC-II Type II Collagen, a patented form. â­ Made with a low-temperature process to preserve biological activity. â­ Pack size: 15 sachets. â­ Suitable for those over 18 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensilab Flexi Force Collagen Chondroitin Plus**: â­ Empty the contents of one sachet into 200ml of water and drink once daily. â­ Use for 2-3 months for best results. â­ Not a substitute for a balanced diet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensilab Flexi Force Collagen Chondroitin Plus**: â­ BioCell collagen (hydrolyzed collagen type II, chondroitin sulfate, hyaluronic acid). â­ Carrier: acacia gum. â­ Rosehip fruit extract. â­ Acidity regulator: Citric acid. â­ Natural orange flavor. â­ Sweetener: sucralose. â­ Anti-caking agent: rice concentrate.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Sensitivity & Gum Toothpaste is clinically proven to relieve teeth sensitivity and improve gum health. **Sensodyne** builds a protective layer over sensitive areas, effectively relieving teeth sensitivity. **Sensodyne** targets and helps remove plaque bacteria to help reduce gum problems. Now you can deal with both these concerning problems in one specialist toothpaste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**:
â­ Always follow the label instructions.
â­ Brush twice a day and no more than three times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne**:
â­ Contains Stannous Fluoride 0.4540% w/w & Sodium Fluoride 0.0721% w/w (1450 ppm fluoride).

**Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair & Protect 75 ml**, an advanced toothpaste with unique repair and protection properties. â­ Contains a concentrated calcium formula to repair vulnerable areas of teeth. â­ Strengthens teeth and repairs sensitive areas. â­ Provides effective cleaning and long-lasting protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair & Protect 75 ml**: â­ Glycerin, â­ Hydrated Silica, â­ Calcium Sodium Phosphosilicate (Novamin), â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine, â­ Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, â­ Aroma, â­ Titanium Dioxide, â­ Carbomer, â­ Sodium Saccharin, â­ Sodium Fluoride, â­ Limonene.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair Whitening 75 Ml** is a powerful toothpaste formulated with Novamin, clinically proven to relieve tooth sensitivity with twice-daily brushing. Its new and improved formula creates a stronger repair layer over vulnerable areas of sensitive teeth, helping you enjoy life without worrying about sensitivity. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair Whitening 75 Ml**: 
â­ Use a maximum of twice daily.
â­ Not suitable for children under 12 years of age.
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily, not more than three times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair Whitening 75 Ml**: 
â­ Active ingredient: Contains sodium fluoride 0.3152% w/w (1450ppm fluoride).

description_en:
**Sensodyne Toothbrush Deep Clean Extra Soft** is a gentle toothbrush that cleans your teeth thoroughly and carefully, reaching even hard-to-reach areas. **Sensodyne** provides superior comfort.  A brand recommended by dentists, specially designed for people with sensitive teeth. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Toothbrush Deep Clean Extra Soft**: 
â­ Brush your teeth at least twice a day for two minutes. 
â­ Use gentle, circular motions. 
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles are frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Toothbrush Deep Clean Extra Soft**: 
â­ Extra-soft nylon bristles. 
â­ Ergonomic handle. 
â­ Modern design.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Deep Clean Gel toothpaste is specially formulated to provide tooth protection. When enamel is worn away or gums recede, the dentine underneath becomes exposed, which can lead to tooth sensitivity. 

â­ Long lasting sensitivity protection*
â­ Contains fluoride to protect against cavities
â­ Helps maintain healthy gums
â­ Deep clean gel sensation
â­ Helps remove plaque build-up

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**: 
â­ Always follow label instructions.
â­ Brush twice a day and no more than three times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne**: 
â­ Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride 0.315% w/w (1450ppm)

**Caution:** For oral use only. Keep out of reach of children. Not for use by children under 12 years of age unless on the advice of a dental professional. Sensitive teeth may indicate an underlying problem that needs prompt care. If symptoms persist or worsen, see your dentist. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Talk to your dentist or doctor as soon as possible if you experience swelling of the mouth or face.

#Sensodyne #Toothpaste #SensitiveTeeth #OralHealth #OralHygiene #Whitening #CavityPrevention #DentalCare #OralCareProducts #KSA

By using **Sensodyne Toothpaste Repair Extra Fresh 75 Ml** twice daily, youâ€™ll get long-lasting sensitivity protection with a fresh feeling that lasts.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Toothbrush Protection Soft 1+1 Free**: Sensitive teeth need special care.  Twinges can be a sign that your teeth are vulnerable due to enamel loss or gum recession. The **Sensodyne Toothbrush Protection Soft 1+1 Free**, with its small angled head, soft outer bristles, and inner twisting bristles, is perfect for those with sensitive teeth.

Why choose the **Sensodyne Toothbrush Protection Soft 1+1 Free**?
â­ Effectively cleans enamel and gums.
â­ Effectively removes plaque.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Toothbrush Protection Soft 1+1 Free**
â­ Avoid excessive pressure while brushing to prevent breakage.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Toothbrush Protection Soft 1+1 Free**
â­ Extra-soft bristles.
â­ Small angled head.
â­ Modern and comfortable design.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Fluoride Toothpaste provides effective, round-the-clock sensitivity protection.  With its unique formula, **Sensodyne** builds a soothing protective barrier around the nerve deep inside the tooth, so you don't worry when you eat or drink.  It also contains fluoride to strengthen teeth and protects against decay. With a fresh minty taste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**:
â­ Always follow label instructions.
â­ Brush twice a day, not more than three times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.
â­ Close the cap tightly after each use.
â­ Do not use if the seal is broken.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne**:
â­ Sodium Fluoride 0.315 % w/w (1426ppm Fluoride)
â­ Potassium Nitrate 5.00% w/w

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Sensitive Toothbrush is specially designed for individuals with sensitive teeth. Its soft, tapered bristles gently clean tooth surfaces and along the gum line. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne** Sensitive Toothbrush:
â­ Avoid excessive pressure while brushing to prevent breakage.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months.
â­ Children under 6 years old require adult supervision while brushing.
â­ Do not chew the bristles or toothbrush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne** Sensitive Toothbrush:
â­ Soft, tapered bristles.
â­ Non-slip handle.
â­ Small brush head.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Toothpaste Pro Enamel For Children 50 Ml** is developed with dentists to help protect children's teeth from the effects of acid erosion. â­ Protects against sugar-related tooth decay. â­ Protects against acid erosion from fruits, sweets, and fizzy drinks. â­ Suitable for milk and permanent teeth. â­ Safe fluoride formula for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Toothpaste Pro Enamel For Children 50 Ml**: â­ For children over 6 years old. â­ Brush twice a day for two minutes. â­ Supervise brushing to minimize swallowing. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Toothpaste Pro Enamel For Children 50 Ml**: â­ Aqua, â­ Sorbitol, â­ Hydrated Silica, â­ Glycerin, â­ PEG-6, â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine, â­ Xanthan Gum, â­ Aroma, â­ Sodium Fluoride, â­ Sodium Saccharin, â­ Sucralose, â­ Titanium Dioxide, â­ Sodium Hydroxide, â­ Limonene.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Enamel Repair Whitening Toothpaste is specially formulated to repair and whiten damaged tooth enamel. Acids in your diet can weaken tooth enamel over time, exposing a dull yellow layer and making it more susceptible to damage. **Sensodyne** helps repair weakened enamel and protect against future acid erosion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**: 
â­ Brush your teeth twice a day, not more than three times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.
â­ Always follow label directions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne**: 
â­ Active Ingredient: Contains sodium fluoride 0.3152% w/w (1450 ppm).

**Sensodyne** is the perfect choice for maintaining healthy and beautiful teeth. Try it today! #Sensodyne #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralHealth #DentalCare #EnamelRepair #Whitening #BeautifulTeeth #BrightTeeth #OralHygiene

**Sensodyne** Original Toothpaste is specially formulated to help protect against the pain of sensitive teeth. It provides effective cleaning with gentle care for your teeth. This product is fluoride-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**:
â­ Use twice daily, not more than three times.

â­ Rinse your mouth with water.
â­ Replace every 3-4 months.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Extra Whitening Toothpaste 75 ml** is a superior toothpaste that helps remove stains for a whiter smile, while effectively relieving tooth sensitivity. Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Extra Whitening Toothpaste 75 ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of toothpaste to a soft-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly for at least one minute, twice daily.
â­ Do not brush more than three times a day.
â­ Minimize swallowing.
â­ Spit out after brushing.
â­ For children under 12 years old: Consult a dentist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Extra Whitening Toothpaste 75 ml**:
â­ Potassium nitrate 5%
â­ Sodium fluoride 0.24%
â­ water, hydrated silica, sorbitol, glycerin, pentasodium triphosphate, PEG-8, flavor, titanium dioxide, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium methyl cocoyl taurate, xanthan gum, sodium hydroxide, sodium saccharin, sucralose

description_en:
**Sensodyne Pronamel Active Shield Whitening Toothpaste 75 Ml**, a superior formula to protect and strengthen your tooth enamel. Designed for defense against cavities and enamel wear by remineralizing weakened enamel. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Pronamel Active Shield Whitening Toothpaste 75 Ml**: 
â­ Brush your teeth twice a day, and not more than three times. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Pronamel Active Shield Whitening Toothpaste 75 Ml**: 
â­ Sodium Fluoride 0.3152% w/w (1450ppm Fluoride). 

â­ 2x stronger resistance against dietary acids from Day 1*. 
â­ 24-hour cavity protection against sugar acids**. 
â­ Enhanced foaming action with fresh mint for a clean and fresh feeling. 
â­ Helps build enamel resistance for cavity & erosion protection. 
*vs your mouth's natural defenses. **With a healthy diet. Brush twice daily to maintain protection.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Pronamel Children Toothbrush Soft, 3-5 Years** is designed for gentle yet effective cleaning of your young children's teeth and gums. â­ Extra-soft bristles protect sensitive enamel and gums. â­ Small head reaches all teeth easily. â­ Comfortable handle for easy grip. â­ Colorful, engaging design encourages brushing. â­ Ideal for use with **Sensodyne Pronamel** toothpaste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Pronamel Children Toothbrush Soft, 3-5 Years**:
â­ Wet bristles with water. â­ Apply a small amount of Sensodyne toothpaste. â­ Brush your child's teeth in circular motions for two minutes. â­ Rinse mouth with water. â­ Replace brush every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Pronamel Children Toothbrush Soft, 3-5 Years**:
â­ Extra-soft nylon bristles. â­ Comfortable plastic handle. â­ Child-safe design.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Toothpaste for Babies 0 - 2 Years 50 ml** is specially formulated to protect your baby's sensitive teeth from the start.  Its mild flavor makes brushing enjoyable and easy. It offers effective cavity protection, strengthens enamel, and is gentle on gums.  The low fluoride formula is safe and free from harsh ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Toothpaste for Babies 0 - 2 Years 50 ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount to your baby's toothbrush. 
â­ Gently brush your baby's teeth using circular motions. 
â­ Ensure all areas of the mouth are reached.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Toothbrush Complete Protection Soft is designed for sensitive teeth. â­ Small angled head for easy access to all areas. â­ Soft outer bristles for gentle gum care. â­ Inner twisting bristles for effective plaque removal. â­ Provides gentle yet effective cleaning for enamel and gums. â­ Removes plaque effectively. â­ Ideal for those with sensitive teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne** Toothbrush Complete Protection Soft:
â­ Avoid excessive pressure while brushing to prevent breakage.
â­ Replace toothbrush every 3 months.
â­ Children under 6 should brush under adult supervision.
â­ Do not chew bristles or toothbrush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne** Toothbrush Complete Protection Soft:
â­ Angled small toothbrush head.
â­ Soft outer bristles.
â­ Inner twisting bristles.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Multi Care Toothbrush 1+1 Free** offers a unique combination of soft bristles and an innovative head design. â­ Gently yet effectively cleans teeth and gums. â­ Dome-shaped head adapts to sensitive areas. â­ Reaches hard-to-clean areas. â­ Economical 1+1 free pack. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Multi Care Toothbrush 1+1 Free**: 
â­ Use the **Sensodyne Multi Care Toothbrush 1+1 Free** twice daily, once in the morning and once in the evening. â­ Clean each tooth with gentle circular motions. â­ Do not press hard on your teeth or gums. â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when the bristles become worn. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Multi Care Toothbrush 1+1 Free**: 
â­ High-quality soft bristles. â­ Domed brush head. â­ Comfortable handle.

description_en:
**Sensodyne Repair & Protect Toothbrush Soft 1+1** is designed for individuals with sensitive teeth. Its soft bristles provide gentle yet effective cleaning. The small angled head, with soft outer and inner twisting bristles, offers extra protection against over-brushing.

Why choose **Sensodyne Repair & Protect Toothbrush Soft 1+1**?
â­ Effective enamel and gum cleaning.
â­ Efficient plaque removal.
â­ Soft bristles protect gums and sensitive teeth.
â­ Small angled head for optimal access to all areas of the mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Repair & Protect Toothbrush Soft 1+1**:
â­ Avoid excessive pressure while brushing to prevent breakage.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3 months for optimal results.
â­ Children under 6 years of age require adult supervision during brushing.
â­ Do not chew on the bristles or toothbrush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne Repair & Protect Toothbrush Soft 1+1**:
â­ High-quality soft bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed brush head.
â­ Comfortable grip handle.

description_en:
**Sensodyne** Gentle Soft Toothbrush provides gentle care for sensitive teeth. â­ Extra-soft bristles for a gentle yet effective clean. â­ Tapered bristle ends for precise cleaning around the gum line. â­ Ideal for people with sensitive teeth and gums. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne**:
â­ Avoid excessive pressure while brushing to prevent breakage. 
â­ Replace your **Sensodyne** toothbrush every 3 months for optimal results. 
â­ Children under 6 years old should brush under adult supervision. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sensodyne**:
â­ Contains no harmful ingredients for gums or teeth. 
â­ Made with safe and healthy materials. 

#Sensodyne #toothbrush #sensitiveteeth #oralcare #oralhygiene #dentalhealth #sensodynetoothbrush #softtouch #healthygums #dentalproducts

**Sensodyne Extra Fresh** Toothpaste provides instant relief from sensitive teeth pain with a long-lasting refreshing flavor.  This 100ml tube offers 33% extra volume, giving you more of the trusted protection and freshness you love. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sensodyne Extra Fresh**: 
â­ Squeeze a pea-sized amount onto your toothbrush.
â­ Brush gently for at least two minutes, twice daily.
â­ Spit out the toothpaste and avoid rinsing immediately.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

description_en:
**Shea Moisture Leave-In Condi. Jamaican Black Castor 312g** is a reparative leave-in conditioner that softens and detangles hair while controlling frizz. Perfect for those who regularly color, straighten, perm, or heat style their hair, as well as kinky, curly, or wavy natural styles. â­Nourishes and moisturizes hair. â­Supports elasticity to resist breakage. â­Improves the appearance of dry split ends. â­Softens and detangles hair. â­Formulated without silicones, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, or petrolatum. â­Sustainably produced and cruelty-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Leave-In Condi. Jamaican Black Castor 312g**:
â­Apply to clean, towel-dried hair. â­Work a generous amount into hair from root to ends. â­Gently comb through for even distribution. â­Do not rinse. â­Apply additional product as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Leave-In Condi. Jamaican Black Castor 312g**:
â­Water, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Behentrimonium Chloride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Dicaprylyl Ether, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Glycerin (Vegetable), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil, Acetic Acid (Apple Cider), Niacin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Yeast Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.

#SheaMoisture #JamaicanBlackCastorOil #LeaveInConditioner #HairCare #NaturalHair #HealthyHair #HairMoisturizer #BeautyProducts #KinkyCurlyHair #SaudiArabia

title_en: **Shea Moisture Shampoo Jamaican Black Castor Strengthen 384ml**
title_ar: **Ø´ÙŠØ§ Ù…ÙˆÙŠØ³ØªØ´Ø± Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø§ÙŠÙƒÙŠ ØªÙ‚ÙˆÙŠØ© 384 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Shea Moisture Shampoo Jamaican Black Castor Strengthen 384ml** is a sulfate-free, clarifying shampoo that removes buildup while infusing hair with nourishing moisture. Perfect for those who regularly color, straighten, perm, or heat style their hair, as well as curly or wavy natural styles. Formulated with Jamaican Black Castor Oil and certified organic Shea Butter to help promote natural growth by strengthening damaged or chemically processed hair, reducing breakage and the resultant shedding. Peppermint Oil helps invigorate the scalp for a tingling experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Shampoo Jamaican Black Castor Strengthen 384ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Shea Moisture Shampoo Jamaican Black Castor Strengthen 384ml** to your hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage into your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Shampoo Jamaican Black Castor Strengthen 384ml**: 
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Decyl Glucoside
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate
â­ Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend)
â­ Glycerin (Vegetable)
â­ Hydrolyzed Rice Protein
â­ Panthenol
â­ Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol
â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract
â­ Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Vinegar
â­ Yeast Extract
â­ Niacin
â­ Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract
â­ Caprylhydroxamic Acid
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Caramel

â­ Supports fair trade.
â­ Cruelty-free.

**Shea Moisture Conditioner Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml** is a luxurious, moisture-rich conditioner designed to soften dry, damaged hair. It features a unique blend of Shea Butter, Mafura Oil, Manuka Honey, and Fig Extract. **Shea Moisture Conditioner Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml** provides intense hydration, leaving your hair soft, shiny, and easily manageable. It's formulated without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and is not tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Conditioner Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml**:

description_en:
**Shea Moisture Shampoo Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml** - for soft, bouncy curls all year round! **Shea Moisture Shampoo Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml** nourishes your hair and restores its lost natural moisture. This shampoo, with its rich blend of certified organic shea butter and essential oils, breathes new life into your dry and damaged hair, making it shiny and healthy. Manuka honey hydrates your hair, leaving it soft and frizz-free, while African rock fig adds a gorgeous shine to your curls. Enjoy soft, healthy curls wherever you go!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Shampoo Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml**:
â­ Wet your hair.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to your hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage until lather forms.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Shampoo Manuka Honey Mafura Oil 384ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Decyl Glucoside
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate
â­ Glycol Stearate
â­ Glycerin (Vegetable)
â­ Hydrolyzed Rice Protein
â­ Panthenol
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*
â­ Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend)
â­ Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil
â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
â­ Trichilia Emetica Seed Butter
â­ Ficus Carica (Fig) Extract
â­ Caprylhydroxamic Acid
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Stearamide AMP
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Honey

title_ar: **Ø´ÙŠØ§ Ù…ÙˆÙŠØ³ØªØ´Ø± Ù…ÙˆØ³ Ø¨Ø¬ÙˆØ² Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ Ùˆ Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ±ÙƒØ¯ÙŠÙ‡ ÙØ±Ø² ÙØ±ÙŠ ÙƒØ±Ù„ 222 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Mousse Frizz Free Curl 222ml** is the perfect solution for dry, frizzy hair! This mousse gives you the freedom to style your hair any way you want, enhancing natural curl memory and wave pattern without leaving any residue. It contains Coconut and neem oils, silk protein, and fair trade shea butter, helping to reduce frizz and add brilliant shine. You'll get smooth, soft, silky hair and enviously bouncy curls. Enriched with Shea Butter and moisture-rich oils, it's ideal for curly hair. Formulated with no silicone, no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil or petrolatum. Tested on our family for generations and never on animals. We support our communities with every purchase.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Mousse Frizz Free Curl 222ml**:
â­ Divide damp hair into sections.
â­ Apply 2 to 3 pumps to each section and comb through.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Mousse Frizz Free Curl 222ml**:
â­ Deionized Water
â­ Cocomidroprpyl Betaine (Coconut) Oil
â­ Vegetable Glycerine
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Oil
â­ Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil
â­ Keratin
â­ Polyquaternium-7
â­ Hibiscus Sabdariffa Extract
â­ Silk Protein
â­ Polyquaternium-10
â­ Sucrose Laurate (and) Alcohol (non-drying)
â­ Melia Azadiratcha (Neem) Seed Oil
â­ Proprietary Essential Oil Blend
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Certified Organic Ingredient.

title_ar: Ø´ÙŠØ§ Ù…ÙˆÙŠØ³ØªØ´Ø± Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø§ÙŠÙƒÙŠ 384 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Shea Moisture Conditioner Jamaican Black Castor 384ml** is a strengthening conditioner that detangles and restores moisture without weighing hair down. Perfect for those who regularly color, straighten, or perm their hair, as well as kinky, curly, and wavy natural styles. This conditioner, formulated with Jamaican Black Castor Oil and Shea Butter, nourishes and strengthens damaged, brittle hair, reducing the appearance of breakage and shedding. Peppermint Oil helps stimulate the scalp for an invigorating experience. **Shea Moisture Conditioner Jamaican Black Castor 384ml** leaves hair shiny and fully rejuvenated. It's free of silicone, sulfates, parabens, mineral oil, petrolatum, and phthalates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Conditioner Jamaican Black Castor 384ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply generously and comb through for even distribution.
â­ Leave in for 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Conditioner Jamaican Black Castor 384ml**:
â­Water, Shea Butter (Certified Organic Ingredient) (Fair Trade Ingredient), Coconut Oil, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend), Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Peppermint Leaf Extract, Glycerin (Vegetable), Jojoba Seed Oil, Macadamia Seed Oil, Castor Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Mauritia Fruit Oil, Yeast Extract, Tocopherol, Aloe Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Clover Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Vinegar, Niacin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Caramel.

description_en:
**Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Gel Curl Souffle 340g** is your best bet for naturally soft, nourished, smooth curls. Its rich blend of Coconut Oil, Agave Nectar, and Flaxseed Oil moisturizes and conditions your hair from roots to ends, leaving it with a frizz-free shine and zero build-up! 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Gel Curl Souffle 340g**:
â­ Apply sparingly to wet or dry hair and comb through with a wide-tooth comb to shape curls.
â­ On wet hair, create defined coils or twist-outs for maximum control and allow to set.
â­ Alternatively, apply to dry hair to reduce flyaways.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Gel Curl Souffle 340g**:
â­ Glycerin (Vegetable)
â­ Water
â­ Corn Syrup
â­ Pectin
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract
â­ Adansonia Digitata Fruit Extract
â­ Panthenol
â­ Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Benzyl Benzoate

title_ar: **Ø´ÙŠØ§ Ù…ÙˆÙŠØ³ØªØ´Ø± Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø¬ÙˆØ² Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ 384 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Shea Moisture Conditioner Virgin Coconut Oil Hydration 384ml** is a luxurious daily conditioner designed to effectively hydrate, soften, and detangle your hair. Suitable for all hair types, it provides deep hydration for dry, damaged hair. Its rich formula, infused with virgin coconut oil, coconut milk, acacia senegal, and shea butter, nourishes hair from roots to ends, leaving it softer, shinier, and stronger. It's free of silicones, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Conditioner Virgin Coconut Oil Hydration 384ml**:
â­ Apply to clean, wet hair.
â­ Gently comb through, working from roots to ends.
â­ Leave in for up to 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use with SheaMoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Shea Moisture Conditioner Virgin Coconut Oil Hydration 384ml**:
â­ Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter * **, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Parfum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Rosa Canina (Dog Rose) Fruit Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Coconut Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Tocopherol, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Sodium Benzoate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Sine Adipe Lac, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Decylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Linalool.

This ultra-moisturizing shampoo provides hydrated, healthier-feeling hair with noticeable shine. Ideal for curly hair, it helps restore and strengthen hair, reducing frizz and improving manageability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Shea Moisture Shampoo Manuka Honey Yoghurt Repair 384ml**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.

â­ Rinse thoroughly.

â­ For best results, follow with SheaMoisture Hydrate + Recover Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Some By Mi Retinol Eye Cream 30 ml**:

description_en:
**SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acid Toner 150 ml** is an effective toner that cleanses, moisturizes, and balances the skin's pH. â­ Prevents acne breakouts. â­ Treats pore problems. â­ Contains green tea to soothe skin and control sebum. â­ Contains AHA, BHA, and PHA for gentle yet effective exfoliation. â­ Deeply cleanses pores from dirt and dead skin cells. â­ Gives skin a smooth, soft texture. â­ Gentle on sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acid Toner 150 ml**: â­ Use morning and evening. â­ Apply an appropriate amount to a cotton pad. â­ Gently wipe skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acid Toner 150 ml**: â­ AHA (exfoliation), â­ BHA (blackhead and whitehead removal), â­ PHA (hydration), â­ Tea Tree Leaf Water (soothing), â­ Korean herbal extracts (soothing).

description_en:
**SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acids Set**: Your perfect skincare routine! â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Contains natural exfoliating acids (AHA, BHA, PHA) for deep cleansing and removal of dead skin cells. â­ Natural Korean ingredients to soothe and strengthen your skin barrier. â­ Includes a soap, toner, serum, and cream, all working together for healthy, radiant skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acids Set**:
â­ Miracle Soap: Lather on wet skin for 1 minute, then rinse. 
â­ Miracle Toner: Soak a cotton pad and gently wipe your face. 
â­ Miracle Serum: Apply a few drops to your face after toner. 
â­ Miracle Cream: Apply an appropriate amount to your face. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Exfoliating Acids Set**:
â­ Natural Exfoliating Acids (AHA, BHA, PHA) 
â­ Centella Extract 
â­ 4-Cica Care 
â­ Tea Tree Leaf Water

â­ After your daily skincare routine, apply an appropriate amount to the face, neck, and hands. â­ Reapply every 2-3 hours for extended sun exposure.

description_en:
**SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Tea Tree Bubble Cleanser 120 ml** is a revolutionary bubble cleanser that deeply cleanses your skin and removes blackheads and whiteheads. â­ Contains 16 different types of tea tree with a rich concentration of green tea. â­ Effectively cleans pores and dissolves blackheads immediately after the first use. â­ Tightens pores and prevents the formation of blackheads and whiteheads again. â­ Contains a rich concentration of exfoliating acids (BHA) and Konjac granules, giving your skin a pure and bright appearance. â­ Magically transforms from a creamy texture to highly effective cleansing bubbles in just 5 minutes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Tea Tree Bubble Cleanser 120 ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Tea Tree Bubble Cleanser 120 ml** to dry skin. â­ Gently massage in a circular motion with a little water for one minute until bubbles form. â­ Leave the bubbles for 5 minutes. â­ Rinse your face with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SomeByMi 30 Days Miracle Tea Tree Bubble Cleanser 120 ml**: 
â­ 16 types of tea tree â­ BHA â­ Green tea tree â­ Konjac granules â­ Centella leaf extract

description_en:
**Some By Mi Retinol Intense Reactivating Serum 30ml (Bundle)** is a powerful anti-aging serum designed to target fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging.  It contains retinol to boost cell turnover, improving skin texture and elasticity. It also includes soothing and hydrating ingredients to minimize irritation. The twin pack ensures continuous use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Some By Mi Retinol Intense Reactivating Serum 30ml (Bundle)**:
â­ Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin, focusing on areas prone to fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Gently massage until absorbed.
â­ Use in the evening, followed by a moisturizer.
â­ Use sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Some By Mi Retinol Intense Reactivating Serum 30ml (Bundle)**:
â­ Retinol
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Centella Asiatica
â­ Soothing and hydrating ingredients

â­ Features original zircon stones.

They are specially made for sensitive skin and feature advanced technology and high-quality surgical stainless steel and 24K gold.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Studex Ear Ring S3544**:

â­ Secure the earring and adjust as desired.

description_en:
**Studex Ear Ring S400STX** - Elevate your style with these classic-inspired, elegant earrings. â­ Sparkling genuine zircon stones. â­ Four-sided metallic design, 24-karat gold-plated. â­ Secure back closure for safety and reliability. â­ Crafted from 316 surgical stainless steel; lightweight and gentle on the ears. â­ Sterilized for safe use, minimizing allergy risks. â­ Meets ECFDA requirements. â­ Ideal for everyday wear. â­ Easy to clean with rubbing alcohol. â­ Stylish and versatile design for various occasions. â­ Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Studex Ear Ring S400STX**:
â­ Prepare your skin before wearing jewelry. â­ Clean your earlobe with alcohol. â­ Clean the earrings with alcohol. â­ Use petroleum jelly for easier insertion. â­ Insert and secure the earrings.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Studex Ear Ring S400STX**:
â­ Genuine zircon stones. â­ 24-karat gold-plated metal. â­ 316 surgical stainless steel.

**Studex Earring Sterilized PR-M100Y**, the all-new range of earrings designed for sensitive skin. â­ Made with high-grade steel, hypoallergenic, and suitable for all skin types and ages. â­ Plated with 24K gold, shiny and elegant. â­ Studded with zircon stones, giving it a glamorous shine. â­ Individually sterilized, safe for daily use. â­ Modern and stylish design. â­ A perfect gift for your loved ones. â­ Proudly made in the USA. â­ Suitable even for sensitive skin. â­ Durable and high quality.

description_en:
**Studex Ear Ring S784STX** adds sophisticated charm to your look. These stunning earrings feature original zircon stones, a 24-karat gold-plated metallic grip, and a secure back closure. Crafted with 316 surgical stainless steel, they're lightweight and comfortable. Sterilized for safe use, they minimize allergic reactions and maintain their sparkle. Perfect for everyday wear and meet ECFDA guidelines.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Studex Ear Ring S784STX**:
â­ Prepare your skin before wearing jewelry.
â­ Clean your earlobe with rubbing alcohol.
â­ Clean the earrings with rubbing alcohol.
â­ Lubricate sharp ends with petroleum jelly for easy insertion.
â­ Insert earrings and secure firmly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Studex Ear Ring S784STX**:
â­ Genuine Zircon Stones
â­ 316 Surgical Stainless Steel
â­ 24-Karat Gold Plating

**Sunsilk Shampoo Hair Fall Solution** is your ultimate solution for hair fall woes. Developed with leading scalp expert Dr. Francesca Fusco, this innovative shampoo revitalizes and strengthens your hair. Featuring a powerful soy protein complex that reduces hair fall by up to 10 times. Keep your hair healthy and strong with **Sunsilk Shampoo Hair Fall Solution**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Hair Fall Solution**:

â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. 
â­ Repeat for best results.

description_en:
**Sunsilk Conditioner Strength & Shine 340ml** is designed to nourish and protect your hair, leaving it strong, shiny, and healthy. This conditioner contains a unique blend of ingredients that help strengthen hair, reduce damage, and boost its natural shine.  It's suitable for all hair types, especially those needing extra strength and vitality. Infused with a unique combination of vitamins and oils, this conditioner nourishes hair from root to tip, leaving it soft, smooth, and full of life.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Strength & Shine 340ml**:
â­ Shampoo your hair.
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Sunsilk Conditioner Strength & Shine 340ml** to your hair, focusing on the ends.
â­ Leave for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Strength & Shine 340ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Citrus Extract
â­ Fragrance

â­ Nourishing Argan Oil
â­ Moisturizing and smoothing ingredients

description_en:
**Sunsilk Shampoo Stunning Black Shine 400 ml** is your secret weapon for unbelievably shiny black hair. â­ Enriched with Argan and Babassu oils for deep nourishment. â­ Reveals natural shine and adds fullness. â­ Suitable for daily use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Stunning Black Shine**:
â­ Apply **Sunsilk Shampoo Stunning Black Shine** to wet hair. â­ Lather gently. â­ Rinse thoroughly. â­ Repeat for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Shampoo Stunning Black Shine**:
â­Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Perfume, Carbomer, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Hydroxide, TEA-Sulfate, Disodium EDTA, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride Amodimethicone, Citric Acid, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Mica, DMDM Hydantoin, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Trideceth-12, Cetrimonium Chloride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, TBHQ, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Lysine HCl, PPG-9, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Panthenol, Magnesium Nitrate, Dimethyl Palmitamine, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Silica, BHT, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Pantolactone, Acetic Acid, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, CI 77891, CI 14720, CI 28440, CI 19140.

**Sunsilk Shampoo Strength & Shine 2x350ml** for strong, shiny hair! â­ Unique formula strengthens each hair strand. â­ Gives you healthy, naturally shiny, and strong hair. â­ Contains Nutri Shine Complex for ultimate smoothness. â­ Blend of Pro-Vitamin B5, Arginine, and Coconut oil for deep moisturization. â­ Protects your hair from daily damage. â­ Leaves your hair silky smooth. â­ Perfect for daily use. â­ Cleanses split ends. â­ Gives you mesmerizing shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Strength & Shine 2x350ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water. â­ Pour a small amount of **Sunsilk Shampoo Strength & Shine 2x350ml** into your palm. â­ Gently massage into your scalp. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Shampoo Strength & Shine 2x350ml**: 
â­ Pro-Vitamin B5. â­ Arginine. â­ Coconut oil. â­ Nutri Shine Complex.

**Sunsilk** Conditioner for soft and smooth hair, enriched with Argan oil, silk protein, and Vitamin C.  It deeply moisturizes and leaves your hair feeling incredibly soft and smooth. Say goodbye to dry and damaged hair with **Sunsilk**, and enjoy soft, silky, and shiny hair.

â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of conditioner to the ends of your hair.

â­Water

title_ar: **ØµÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù‚ÙˆØ© ÙˆÙ„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† 1 Ù„ØªØ±**
description_en:
**Sunsilk Shampoo Shine & Strength 1L**, Rise and shine! This shampoo boasts a unique formula that strengthens each hair fibre, revealing healthy-looking and reinforced hair with a natural shine. Its exclusive formula smoothly coats each strand, leaving your hair strong and incredibly shiny. A unique blend of Pro-Vitamin B5, Arginine, and Coconut oil deeply moisturizes dry hair, giving you smooth hair always. This shampoo makes your hair resilient and helps protect it from daily damage. With **Sunsilk Shampoo Shine & Strength 1L**, take your hair styling game to the next level.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Shine & Strength 1L**:
â­ Wet your hair.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your hair.
â­ Gently massage your scalp.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Shampoo Shine & Strength 1L**:
â­ Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Perfume, Pantolactone, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Limonene, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, DMDM Hydantoin, PEG 150 Distearate, PEG 7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Lysine HCl, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Pantolactone, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Helianthus Annuus Sunflower Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone.

description_en:
**Sunsilk Defined Curls Hair Cream 200ml** is the perfect cream to enhance and define your natural curls. This lightweight cream is formulated to provide long-lasting hold while keeping curls soft, bouncy, and frizz-free. Whether your curls are loose waves or tight ringlets, this cream helps to bring out their natural texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Defined Curls Hair Cream 200ml**:
â­ Wash your hair with your preferred Sunsilk shampoo and conditioner.
â­ Apply a generous amount of the cream to damp, towel-dried hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Scrunch your hair upwards and let it air-dry or use a diffuser with a hairdryer.
â­ For tighter curls, twist sections of hair or use a curling iron.
â­ Do not rinse; it's designed to be left in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Defined Curls Hair Cream 200ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Polyquaternium-7
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk Protein

description_en:
**Sunsilk Conditioner Instant Repair 340ml** instantly repairs damaged hair with its rich formula of keratin, almond oil, and vitamin C.  Frequent blow-drying, coloring, and styling can damage hair, but **Sunsilk Instant Repair Conditioner** is here to help!  It contains keratin to strengthen, almond oil to repair daily damage, and vitamin C to prevent breakage.  It repairs hair from the first wash, leaving it strong and vibrant. Use **Sunsilk Instant Repair Conditioner** after shampooing, applying it to the ends of your hair only. Say goodbye to damaged hair and enjoy healthy, beautiful locks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Instant Repair 340ml**:
â­ Use after shampooing in every wash.
â­ Apply to hair ends only, not the roots.
â­ Leave on for one minute.
â­ Rinse well.
â­ For best results, use with other Sunsilk products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Instant Repair 340ml**:
â­ Keratin
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Vitamin C

description_en:
**Sunsilk Conditioner Hairfall Solution 340ml** is specifically designed to reduce hair fall due to breakage and improve the strength and resilience of your hair.  Its unique formula, enriched with vitamins and nourishing ingredients, strengthens hair from root to tip, reducing hair fall and promoting a healthier look. The result is visibly fuller, smoother, and more manageable hair with reduced breakage and noticeably less hair fall over time. Ideal for fragile or thinning hair, it restores hairâ€™s natural strength and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Hairfall Solution**
â­ Shampoo your hair first with a suitable shampoo.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Sunsilk Conditioner Hairfall Solution** to your hair from mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Leave it for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Hairfall Solution**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance

description_en:
**Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 170 ml** is your ultimate solution for dry, damaged hair! Tired of dry, brittle hair? With **Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 170 ml**, you'll get deep, intense hydration that restores your hair's vitality and shine. Its rich formula, infused with collagen and hyaluronic acid, nourishes hair from root to tip, leaving it incredibly soft and radiant. Say goodbye to dry, damaged hair and hello to healthy, beautiful locks!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 170 ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Leave it on for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 170 ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Behentrimonium Chloride
â­ Parfum
â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Amodimethicone
â­ More ingredients...
